description: Navigation deep link crashes app when launched. Intent handling or argument parsing failure.
commonCauses: Deep link URI pattern mismatch with actual URI
Required navigation argument missing from deep link
Argument type mismatch (expecting Int, got String)
NavHost not initialized when deep link processed
Multiple NavHosts handling same deep link
solutions: Validate deep link URIs match nav graph patterns exactly
Provide default values for optional arguments
Parse and validate arguments before navigation
Ensure NavHost ready before processing deep links
Test deep links with adb: adb shell am start -a android.intent.action.VIEW -d 'uri'
Handle missing or malformed arguments gracefully
Use NavDeepLinkBuilder for programmatic deep links
prevention: Test all deep links with adb shell commands
Validate deep link URI patterns in nav graph
Provide default values for all navigation arguments
Use type-safe navigation arguments (Safe Args plugin)
Document deep link format and requirements
Test deep links from cold start and warm start
Implement deep link validation in CI tests
